description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace, containing pure virtual methods for handling various event types such as runtime, window, ripple, and state change events, each accepting JSON data or event name as parameters.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling different types of events related to runtime, window, ripple, and state change within the WPEFramework plugin framework.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles runtime manager events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handles window manager events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handles ripple-specific events, taking a string as the event name and JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handles state change events with provided JSON data.
